name: Category Picker
description: A custom field that provides an intuitive hierarchical interface for selecting categories and subcategories from your Agility CMS lists. Automatically maintains parent-child relationships and stores selections as comma-separated IDs.

configValues.name: categoriesListReferenceName
configValues.label: Categories List Reference Name
configValues.description: The reference name of the list containing categories. Default: ArticleCategories

configValues.name: subcategoriesListReferenceName
configValues.label: Sub-categories List Reference Name
configValues.description: The reference name of the list containing subcategories. Default: ArticleSubCategories

configValues.name: categoryIdsFieldName
configValues.label: Category IDs Field Name
configValues.description: The field name to store category IDs. Default: CategoriesIDs

configValues.name: subcategoryIdsFieldName
configValues.label: Sub-Category IDs Field Name
configValues.description: The field name to store subcategory IDs. Default: SubcategoriesIDs

fields.name: ArticleCategoryField
fields.label: Sub-Category Picker
fields.description: A specialized field for selecting categories and subcategories from Agility CMS lists
